title: Fractionally Differentiated Features
hypothesis: Using fractionally differentiated price series preserves memory while achieving stationarity, improving ML model performance
counterparty: Traders using raw prices or simple returns lose important long-term memory
edgeSource: Statistical - fractional differentiation balances stationarity vs memory retention
source: De Prado 'Advances in Financial ML' Chapter 5
references: De Prado Chapter 5: Fractionally Differentiated Features
